title: Clinton, Maryland
summary: Clinton is an unincorporated census-designated place (CDP) in Prince George's County, Maryland, United States.[1] Clinton was formerly known as Surrattsville until after the time of the Civil War. The population of Clinton was 35,970 at the 2010 census.[2] Clinton is historically known for its role in the American Civil War concerning the Abraham Lincoln assassination.  Clinton is adjacent to Camp Springs, Rosaryville, Melwood, and Andrews Air Force Base.
